text: In April of that year his first  wife's brother-in-law, the diplomatist Lord Ponsonby, had written to advise Anglesey to give the system a trial, adding that it was being cultivated with extraordinary success in France and Italy and that he himself was being treated under a doctor who had studied under its founder, the Dr. Samuel Hahnemann.
